text: Blood Fire Death is the fourth studio album by the Swedish extreme metal band Bathory. It was released on 8 October 1988, through the music label of Under One Flag. The album is mainly black metal, but it is sometimes called the first viking metal album. In 2009, IGN included Blood Fire Death in their "10 Great Black Metal Albums" list. == Track listing == == People == * Quorthon – guitar and vocals * Vvornth – drums * Kothaar – bass * Peter Nicolai Arbo – album cover painting, The Wild Hunt of Odin (Åsgårdsreien) * Pelle Matteus – sleeve photography == References == Category:1988 albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Blood Fire Death
